text: Juna vyaktila'i allahale pathapradarsana gardacha usale margadarsana prapta garcha ra jasala'i margavicalita gardacha, tapa'ile allaha baheka aru kohi usako mitra pa'une chainau ra hamile tyasta manisaharula'i kiyamataka dina ghopteko avasthama andho, lato ra bahiro bana'era ekatrita garnechaum. Ra tiniharuko basasthala narka hunecha. Jaba tyasako nibhne avastha huncha ta hamile tyasala'i aru prajvalita garidine chaum
